Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: A team must be supported by a ScrumMaster

Name: product_backlog_has_owner
Description: The Product Backlog must be managed by a Product Owner

Name: user_story_has_acceptance_criteria
Description: A User Story must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: task_not_blocked
Description: A task in progress should not be blocked

Name: sprint_has_goal
Description: Every sprint must have a defined goal

Name: worker_has_required_skill
Description: A worker assigned to a task must have the required skill

Name: feature_included_in_release
Description: A feature planned for a release must be marked as done

Name: budget_not_exceeded
Description: The total project cost must not exceed the allocated budget
